plot: After committing a double murder, Shumona flees from the police and seeks refuge at a stranger's apartment. Close on her tracks is legendary detective, Faruk Uddin who has never taken more ...
title: Bahattor Ghonta
plot_es: After committing a double murder, Shumona flees from the police and seeks refuge at a stranger's apartment. Close on her tracks is legendary detective, Faruk Uddin who has never taken more ...
